content.text: Match ends, Apollon Limassol 1, Atalanta 1.
Second Half ends, Apollon Limassol 1, Atalanta 1.
Goal!  Apollon Limassol 1, Atalanta 1. Emilio Jose Zelaya (Apollon Limassol) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by João Pedro.
Etrit Berisha (Atalanta) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Robin Gosens (Atalanta).
Anton Maglica (Apollon Limassol) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Bruno Vale.
Attempt saved. Riccardo Orsolini (Atalanta) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrea Petagna.
José Luis Palomino (Atalanta) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Substitution, Atalanta. Marten de Roon replaces Bryan Cristante.

Attempt saved. Antonio Jakolis (Apollon Limassol) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Emilio Jose Zelaya.
Substitution, Apollon Limassol. Anton Maglica replaces Alex da Silva.
Offside, Apollon Limassol. Allan tries a through ball, but Emilio Jose Zelaya is caught offside.
